EmailTemplate.name: 2019.03.27 - SUB - Coffee Subscription - FR.2019.03.27 - Coffee Subscription - F
EmailTemplate.subject: À tous les amateurs de café
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Consultez l'offre en ligne <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/EN/search/pages/category/_/N-1z0czra.aspx?cmp=EBBIGDEALS2018EN&email={{lead.Email Address}}&utm_source={{my.UTM Source}}&utm_medium={{my.UTM Medium}}&utm_content={{my.UTM Content}}&utm_campaign={{my.UTM Campaign}}]]>
Centre d'aubaines <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/EN/search/pages/category/_/N-1z0czra.aspx?cmp=EBBIGDEALS2018EN&email={{lead.Email Address}}&utm_source={{my.UTM Source}}&utm_medium={{my.UTM Medium}}&utm_content={{my.UTM Content}}&utm_campaign={{my.UTM Campaign}}]]> <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/EN/search/pages/browse/_/N-1z0bsdm.aspx?cmp=EBCLEARANCE2018EN&email={{lead.Email Address}}&utm_source={{my.UTM Source}}&utm_medium={{my.UTM Medium}}&utm_content={{my.UTM Content}}&utm_campaign={{my.UTM Campaign}}]]>
Liquidation ! <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/EN/search/pages/browse/_/N-1z0bsdm.aspx?cmp=EBCLEARANCE2018EN&email={{lead.Email Address}}&utm_source={{my.UTM Source}}&utm_medium={{my.UTM Medium}}&utm_content={{my.UTM Content}}&utm_campaign={{my.UTM Campaign}}]]> <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/EN/search/pages/category/_/N-1z0crxh?cmp=EBNEWPRODUCTS2018EN&email={{lead.Email Address}}&utm_source={{my.UTM Source}}&utm_medium={{my.UTM Medium}}&utm_content={{my.UTM Content}}&utm_campaign={{my.UTM Campaign}}]]>
Nouveaux <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/EN/search/pages/category/_/N-1z0crxh?cmp=EBNEWPRODUCTS2018EN&email={{lead.Email Address}}&utm_source={{my.UTM Source}}&utm_medium={{my.UTM Medium}}&utm_content={{my.UTM Content}}&utm_campaign={{my.UTM Campaign}}]]> Préparez-vous une autre tasse <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/dcr/sites/core/subscription-program.aspx?cmp=EBSUBSCRIPTION19EN&email={{lead.Email Address}}&utm_source={{my.UTM Source}}&utm_medium={{my.UTM Medium}}&utm_content={{my.UTM Content}}&utm_campaign={{my.UTM Campaign}}]]> <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/dcr/sites/core/subscription-program.aspx?cmp=EBSUBSCRIPTION19EN&email={{lead.Email Address}}&utm_source={{my.UTM Source}}&utm_medium={{my.UTM Medium}}&utm_content={{my.UTM Content}}&utm_campaign={{my.UTM Campaign}}]]> Abonnez-vous à notre programme d’achat de café et vous recevrez des livraisons automatiques planifiées de votre boisson préférée. Vous ne manquerez plus jamais de café!
*En prime - Obtenez GRATUITEMENT une cafetière Keurig lorsque vous vous abonnez S’abonner <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/Account/Logon?ReturnUrl=%2fSubscriptionOrders%2fWizardPage1?cmp=EBSUBSCRIPTION19EN&email={{lead.Email Address}}&utm_source={{my.UTM Source}}&utm_medium={{my.UTM Medium}}&utm_content={{my.UTM Content}}&utm_campaign={{my.UTM Campaign}}]]> Service à la clientèle <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/en/sites/core/contact-us.aspx?cmp=EBCUSTOMERCARE2018EN&email={{lead.Email Address}}]]> | Modalites <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/en/sites/core/terms-and-conditions.aspx?cmp=EBTERMS2018EN&email={{lead.Email Address}}]]> | Confidentialite <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/en/sites/core/privacy-policy.aspx?cmp=EBPRIVACY2018EN&email={{lead.Email Address}}]]> Grand & Toy | 200 Aviva Park Drive, Vaughan, ON L4L9C7 | 1-866-391-8111
*Dans le cadre de cette promotion spéciale, vous devez vous engager à acheter chaque mois un nombre minimal de boîtes de dosettes K-Cup pendant une période de 1 an pour obtenir gratuitement une cafetière Keurig parmi les modèles disponibles. Pour vous abonner au programme et obtenir une cafetière gratuite, veuillez cliquer ici et suivre les étapes.
